root.name: American Mensa Academy
root.description: OverviewPuzzle your way through 100 minigames, puzzles and other challenges in this brain training game. The game is being supported by Mensa, a society for High IQ training.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 (32Bit 64Bit) / Windows 8 (32Bit 64Bit)Processor: Pentium 4 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 3000Memory: 1GB Ram (Windows XP) / 2GB (Windows Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8)Hard Disk Space: 1GBVideo Card: 512MB nVIDIA GeForce 7000 Series / AMD Radeon 1900 series or betterDirectX®: 9.0cSound: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatibile sound device
